text:
drchrono Mountain View, CA | Onsite, Fulltime | Visa sponsorship available

drchrono is hiring for backend engineers to work on our award winning iPad EHR (Electronic Health Record) and Medical Billing System. You can take our fun online hacker test here: https://www.hackerrank.com/tests/527036edb11ff/0ca5532381fbe...

We reach out to all top-scoring candidates.
